members.name: WindowBase64.atob()
members.description: Decodes a string of data which has been encoded using base-64 encoding.

members.name: WindowBase64.btoa()
members.description: Creates a base-64 encoded ASCII string from a string of binary data.

parameters.name: stringToEncode
parameters.description: A string whose characters each represent a single byte of binary data to be encoded into ASCII.
